allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix loading overlay timeout issue

- Changed timeout logic to only set ONCE when loading starts
- Removed problematic useEffect that reset timeout every progress update
- Added hasSetTimeoutRef to track timeout state
- Added extensive console logging for debugging
- Added proper cleanup in useEffect returns and error handlers
- Fixed X button to properly reset timeout state

This should fix the infinite loading overlay that was stuck for 30+ minutes.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
